title: B5 ADC main looking for a team to develop and climb with
body:
IGN: EndlesschocXD
Age: 19
Role: ADC
Preferred Champions: {{champion:51}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:110}} 
What im looking for: i am mostly looking for a team that i can be a part of that can play and develop together, we can play serious and casually, if things go the way intended we can hopefully climb :)

I do have skype but will only give to those that are serious and want to be a part of this.

if interested post your details and the role which you main or play most.
Thanks.
